name: ROCKET BOT ROYALE by Winterpixel Games
name_original: ROCKET BOT ROYALE by Winterpixel Games
description:
ROCKET BOT ROYALE A BATTLE ROYALE SET ON A SINKING,
DESTRUCTIBLE ISLAND.

Welcome to Rocket Bot Royale!  Battle against other players and NPCs in real-time from around the world.  Battles start every 90 seconds and will match players in the same lobby until full or the timer runs out. Collect coins to spend on loadouts in subsequent battles. Spend wisely!

For a threaded HTML5 build (godot threads) visit the below link directly:

https://rocketbotroyale.winterpixel.io

Join the Rocket Bot Community:
